entry.tran: 同时发生的;同时出现的;同步的
entry.def: Things which are simultaneous happen or exist at the same time.

example.ex: ...the simultaneous release of the book and the album...

example.ex: The theatre will provide simultaneous translation in both English and Chinese.
example.tran: 剧院将提供英语和汉语的同声翻译。

stems_affixes.word_buile: simult相类似,一样+aneous……特征的→时间相同的
simultaneous[adj.同时的,同时存在的]+ly表副词→adv.同时地
simult相类似,一样+aneity表名词→n.同时发生,同时

Sentence.sentence: Ebola-Zaire seemed to erupt in over 50 villages simultaneously.
The potential to provide 60-100% more food by simply eliminating losses, while simultaneously freeing up land, energy and water resources for other uses, is an opportunity that should not be ignored
Children are capable of learning more than one language, whether simultaneously or sequentially(依次地).

sentences.en: We struck at several of his units simultaneously.
